method context [line 29]

	

    

    

		String context(
[String
$context = null])
    

    


	
		Set or get context of instance.

The context is a named folder where cache data will be stored.    Return current context if not specified or a new if to.





Tags:





  

    access:  public

method get [line 48]

	

    

    

		String/False get(
mixed
$id)
    

    


	
		Get stored cache by $id specified.

Return String of stored cache or false if cache have expired time or not exist.





Tags:





  

    access:  public
  









	
        
Parameters:

    

    

          

        mixed  
        $id

method put [line 68]

	

    

    

		String put(
mixed
$id, [String
$data = null], [Integer
$expire = 3600])
    

    


	
		Put $data on cache by $id specified.

You can set a $expire time of this cached $id, use seconds to.





Tags:





  

    return:  - File name of stored content.
